May 1, 1937 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Corn Exchange, Dalkeith, Midlothian, Scotland, UK Best section 3 band - Newtongrange Lothian. Best section 4 band - Airdrie Old Union. Hymn tune contest - 1st Tullis Russell, 2nd Cowdenbeath, 3rd City of Edinburgh, 4th Musselburgh and Fisherrow. 7th annual contest 14 bands competed
Jan. 17, 2014, 4:26 p.m. Jan. 18, 2019, 11:25 a.m.

2 Newtongrange Band George Hawkins
3 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
4 City of Edinburgh Band F. C. Davison
5 Monklands Youth Concert Brass John Faulds
